nodes.text: Jex was a Human male Mantellian Separatist during the Separatist War against the Galactic Republic, which was backing the Ord Mantell Central Authority. He was stationed in the Separatist Base on Mannett Point when a sergeant of Havoc Squad infiltrated the base. He was encountered by the sergeant along with his wounded Separatist fellows, but the sergeant let them go under the condition that they'd fight no more.
Jex first appeared in the storyline for the Republic Trooper class in Star Wars: The Old Republic, where he was voiced by Erik McDowell.
